title: Writing the exam when it's high
subtitle: The student under influence produces a strange test paper.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A student who is making his way to university fears that he will not have enough time outside work to prepare properly for the next examination. He began to take amphetamines to stay awake and study all day while continuing to work at night. After a few weeks, he sits in his exam and leaves the room confident that he did very well. The following day, he is summoned to the trainer's office and asked to explain why he had given an examination that included only papers covered in his name.
